<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Healer's Halo](/Feats.aspx?ID=2287) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Halo](/Feats.aspx?ID=1351)

**Trigger**
You or allies within 30 feet recover Hit Points while your halo is active.

</column>

---

Your halo can enhance positive energy. Creatures who have recovered Hit Points from a [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89) effect recover an additional 1d6 Hit Points. Creatures who benefit from this power become temporarily immune to its effect for the next 10 minutes.
name: Healer's Halo
